Good Comments: Zero to none mistakes, high quality, pretty quick
Excellent Quality, Excellent Sub, the only fansub that finished the series :)
Bad Comments: best sub and video quality out of the other fansub groups.
Good quality checks, and managed to revive the subbing and finish the series in a concentrated manner.
Perfect Karaoke, perfect translation, love their translation notes, simply blew my mind away with their work.  Also in MKV files, which is my fav file format.

Aside from being the first and only group to actually finish subbing this series, C1 in cooperation with Animanda did a wonderful joint job. I liked their subs for the later episodes better, but overall it was easy to understand and read
